name: No Buddies Land
description: The player puts himself in control of Bud, the chosen one, who must prevent the land where he lives from being flooded. In order to save it he must climb up into heaven to ask for help before everything is destroyed. There are five levels that has to completed. As each level begins, the waters begin to rise what resembles the time the player has to fight against. There are a lot of enemies on the way but they can be exterminated using a gun.
